data.text: Eka Jehova Nyasaye nodwoko Ayub gi ei yamo maduongʼ. Nowacho kama:
“Ma to en ngʼa ma umo riekona
Koro aa malo ka dichwo;
“Ne in kune chiengʼ mane achungo mise mag piny?
En ngʼa mane opimo borne gi lachne? Ero iwacho ni ingʼeyo!
Mise mage noyie e angʼo?
Chiengʼ mane sulwe mokinyi wer kanyakla
“En ngʼa mane ochoko nam kanyachiel
En ngʼa mane otimo kamano kane aume gi boche kaka nangane
kane aketone tongʼ mage
Kane awacho ni, ‘Ka ema onego ichopie ma ok ikalo;
“Bende nitiere chik misegolo mondo piny oyawre,
Bende isechiko piny mondo oyawre maler
Ka piny yawore to gik moko duto nenore maler;
Joma timbegi richo itamoe ler,
“Bende isewuotho michopo nyaka e sokni manie bwo nam
Bende osenyisi dhorangaye mag tho?
Bende ingʼeyo chuth ni piny duongʼ maromo nade?
“Yo miluwo kidhi dala ler en mane?
Bende inyalo kawogi mi idwokgi kuondegi?
Nenore ni ingʼeyo, nikech ne gichakore kosenywoli!
“Bende isedonjo e dere mokanie pe madongo
ma akano ne kinde mag chandruok,
Bende ingʼeyo yo midhigo kuma mil polo riadore,
En ngʼa mane osiemo ni koth maduongʼ
mondo okel ngʼich kama onge dhano modakie ma
mondo oduog chuny piny motwo
Koth bende nigi wuon mare?
Min pe to en ngʼa?
mamiyo nam doko matek ka kidi,
“Bende inyalo choko sulwe mag yugni mitue?
Bende inyalo miyo sulwe maratego mondo owuogi e kindene mowinjore
Bende ingʼeyo chike mag polo?
“Bende inyalo golo chik ne boche polo
Bende ioro mor polo e yoregi ma giluwo?
En ngʼa mane oketo rieko
En ngʼa mariek manyalo kwano boche polo?
milok buru bed matek
“Bende dinyal dwaro chiemo ni sibuor madhako
e kinde ma gibuto e gondgi
En ngʼa mamiyo agak chiemo
